DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to assess the effects of MK0524A in reducing flushing associated with niacin.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of MK0524A on Flushing Caused by Niacin (0524A-056)
DOC.criteria: Patient is male or female between 18 and 70 years of age Females of reproductive potential must agree to take acceptable contraceptive precautions for the duration of the study Patient has a history of hypersensitivity to niacin or niacincontaining products Patient is currently experiencing menopausal hot flashes Patient consumes more than 2 alcoholic beverages per day Patient has poorly controlled Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus Patient engages in vigorous exercise or an aggressive diet regimen
